## Problem

A clear description of the problem or limitation this feature would address. What are you trying to do that's difficult or impossible today?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like. How should it work?

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative approaches you've thought about and why you ruled them out.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, mockups, or examples.
